rows.label: qev075402_MSG0001
rows.name:
A human this time, is it? My, my. We don't usually see
so many customers come through these parts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_MSG0002
rows.name:
Pleased to meet you. My name is Moore,
and I sell weapons to travelers like yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what sorts of weapons he trades in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_SEL0021
rows.name: Claim that Moore stole Gi Zang's blade.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_MSG0003
rows.name: I stock everything from battle rifles to hyper missiles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_MSG0004
rows.name: Though my inventory's most recent addition is a sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_MSG0005
rows.name:
Quite the marvel, this. It's Wrothian in make,
but boasts a keener edge than any I've seen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_MSG0006
rows.name: ...What's that? You came here looking for it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_MSG0007
rows.name:
I see. Though I'm loath to part which such a specimen,
I suppose I could be persuaded for the right price.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_MSG0009
rows.name:
I am a simple merchant, friend. Such adventurous feats
are far beyond me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_MSG0010
rows.name:
Now, shall we speak of business? I am quite interested
in acquiring the gear you're carrying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_MSG0011
rows.name:
In return, I would be willing to trade you every bullet in
my magazine. Fired directly at you at an extremely
high velocity, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075402_MSG0012
rows.name: Now allow me to demonstrate my most excellent wares![ST:wait ]
